name: Invisible Path (Neengash)
description:
This game is still under development, bugs or minor gameplay problems should be expected.

Invisible Path

A 2 player game in which players will take turns "rolling" a boll along the board with the objective of getting to the scoring space (star). Once a player gets to 3 points, he wins.

On their turn, players should click on an arrow to roll the ball into the board from that side, and carefully observe the path the ball takes, learning which special effects could have affected it.

Special Effects

  • Always goes to ____: No matter the ball movement direction, it will always exit the current space in a specific direction (top, right, bot, left).
  • Wall bounce: Ball bounces in the center of the space as if a diagonal "wall" was placed there. The wall can be in either of both diagonal positions.
  • Rotation Effect: Ball direction is rotated either clockwise or counterclockwise
  • Hole: The ball ends its movement in the given cell.
